Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: New Year's jug
Description: Small vase with a globular body, with a rounded base and flattened lip; a so-called New Year's jug. A small vase, of the ''loaggy'' type, made from enamel, whose green colour has mostly disappeared.
